tests.name: test_uppercase
tests.cmd: test_uppercase("A HORRIBLE HATEFUL MESSAGE FROM A TROLL");

tests.name: test_description
tests.cmd: test_description("This technique, called _disemvowelment_, is often employed to reduce the effectiveness of troll messages in online fora.");
tests.expected: "Ths tchnq, clld _dsmvwlmnt_, s ftn mplyd t rdc th ffctvnss f trll mssgs n nln fr."

tests.name: test_non_ascii
tests.cmd: test_non_ascii("「Disemvowelment」はASCII文字に対してのみ有効です。");
tests.expected: "「Dsmvwlmnt」はSC文字に対してのみ有効です。"
